title: Mirror font and stamp font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828212405im_/http:/typophile.com/files/THIS%20DAY_5016.jpg)

Sorry this is sideways...need to know the font for 'day' and for 'AGAIN'
author: Pat54

comments.content: I would like to know what font 'day' is and also for the word 'AGAIN'. Thanks for your help!

"AGAIN" appears to be Octin Spraypaint A Regular:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/octin-spraypaint/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828212405/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/octin-spraypaint/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/octin-spraypaint/")  
 [http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/octin-spraypaint-free](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828212405/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/octin-spraypaint-free "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/octin-spraypaint-free")

"day" was harder to match, but I'm pretty sure its Porcelain:  
 [http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/porcelain](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828212405/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/porcelain "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/porcelain")

The following are also close, but not spot-on:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-petite-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828212405/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-petite-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-petite-script/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dsgnhaus/le-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828212405/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dsgnhaus/le-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dsgnhaus/le-script/")  
 [http://www.fontspace.com/billy-argel/dirty-and-classic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828212405/http:/www.fontspace.com/billy-argel/dirty-and-classic "http://www.fontspace.com/billy-argel/dirty-and-classic")
